doc.field: Records of the Black Alumni Network
Records of the Black Alumni Network

The Records of the Black Alumni Network contain promotional material for the NYU Black Alumni Network's 2017 "Discovering our Legacy" programs, informational fliers, and a 2012 Milestones of Diversity publication.

The Records of the Black Alumni Network contain promotional material for the NYU Black Alumni Network's 2017 "Discovering our Legacy" programs, informational fliers, and a 2012 Milestones of Diversity publication.
New York University. Black Alumni Network
New York University. Black Alumni Network
New York University. Black Alumni Network
These records contain promotional material for the Black Alumni Network's 2017 Discovering our Legacy programs, informational fliers, and a 2012 Milestones of Diversity publication.

The NYU Black Alumni Network seeks to empower, connect, and celebrate the Black Community within the greater New York University network. The Black Alumni Network unites alumni and students of the NYU community in collaboration with the NYU Alumni Relations by establishing relationships, connections, and opportunities to alumni of the African diaspora.
Donated by Jamila Mclaughlin, November 2017. The accession number associated with this gift is 2019.072.
